languages.text: "Я буду молиться о ниспослании Вольному Торговца откровения Омниссии, что позволит найти Чудотворному Реактору место, что отвечает могуществу сей машины".

traits.locale_text: "Я буду молиться о ниспослании Вольному Торговца откровения Омниссии, что позволит найти Чудотворному Реактору место, что отвечает могуществу сей машины".

languages.text: "I will pray for the Rogue Trader to receive a revelation from the Omnissiah that will let {mf|him|her} find a place becoming of the great machine's mighty energies."
languages.original_text: "Я буду молиться о ниспослании Вольному Торговца откровения Омниссии, что позволит найти Чудотворному Реактору место, что отвечает могуществу сей машины".

traits.locale_text: "I will pray for the Rogue Trader to receive a revelation from the Omnissiah that will let {mf|him|her} find a place becoming of the great machine's mighty energies."
"I will pray for the Rogue Trader to receive a revelation from the Omnissiah that will let {mf|him|her} find a place becoming of the great machine's mighty energies."
"I will pray for the Rogue Trader to receive a revelation from the Omnissiah that will let {mf|him|her} find a place becoming of the great machine's mighty energies."
"I will pray for the Rogue Trader to receive a revelation from the Omnissiah that will let {mf|him|her} find a place becoming of the great machine's mighty energies."
"I will pray for the Rogue Trader to receive a revelation from the Omnissiah that will let {mf|him|her} find a place becoming of the great machine's mighty energies."
"I will pray for the Rogue Trader to receive a revelation from the Omnissiah that will let {mf|him|her} find a place becoming of the great machine's mighty energies."

languages.text: 「自由開拓者が万機神の啓示を得て、偉大なる機械の強力なるエネルギーとなる場所を見つけられるよう祈るよ」
languages.original_text: "I will pray for the Rogue Trader to receive a revelation from the Omnissiah that will let {mf|him|her} find a place becoming of the great machine's mighty energies."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者が万機神の啓示を得て、偉大なる機械の強力なるエネルギーとなる場所を見つけられるよう祈るよ」

languages.text: « Je vais prier pour que l'Omnimessie accorde {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} une révélation qui lui permettra de trouver un lieu digne d'accueillir les puissantes énergies de la grande machine. »
languages.original_text: "I will pray for the Rogue Trader to receive a revelation from the Omnissiah that will let {mf|him|her} find a place becoming of the great machine's mighty energies."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais prier pour que l'Omnimessie accorde {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} une révélation qui lui permettra de trouver un lieu digne d'accueillir les puissantes énergies de la grande machine. »

languages.text: “我愿为行商浪人祈祷，希望{mf|他|她}能得到欧姆尼塞亚的启示，能找到与伟大的机器能量融为一体的地方。”
languages.original_text: "I will pray for the Rogue Trader to receive a revelation from the Omnissiah that will let {mf|him|her} find a place becoming of the great machine's mighty energies."

traits.locale_text: “我愿为行商浪人祈祷，希望{mf|他|她}能得到欧姆尼塞亚的启示，能找到与伟大的机器能量融为一体的地方。”

languages.text: "Dann werde ich für {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} beten, eine Offenbarung des Omnissiah möge {mf|ihn|ihr} einen Platz finden lassen, der den mächtigen Energien der großen Maschine würdig ist."
languages.original_text: "I will pray for the Rogue Trader to receive a revelation from the Omnissiah that will let {mf|him|her} find a place becoming of the great machine's mighty energies."

traits.locale_text: "Dann werde ich für {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} beten, eine Offenbarung des Omnissiah möge {mf|ihn|ihr} einen Platz finden lassen, der den mächtigen Energien der großen Maschine würdig ist."

languages.text: «Rezaré para que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente reciba una revelación del Omnissiah que le permita encontrar un lugar digno de las poderosas energías de la gran máquina».
languages.original_text: "I will pray for the Rogue Trader to receive a revelation from the Omnissiah that will let {mf|him|her} find a place becoming of the great machine's mighty energies."

traits.locale_text: «Rezaré para que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente reciba una revelación del Omnissiah que le permita encontrar un lugar digno de las poderosas energías de la gran máquina».

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, Hermesih'ten vahiy alsın ve makinenin kudretli enerjilerine layık bir yer bulabilsin diye dua edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "I will pray for the Rogue Trader to receive a revelation from the Omnissiah that will let {mf|him|her} find a place becoming of the great machine's mighty energies."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir, Hermesih'ten vahiy alsın ve makinenin kudretli enerjilerine layık bir yer bulabilsin diye dua edeceğim."
